document_data.name: The Great Funnel
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Funnel''' was a [[divine realm]] within the [[Elemental Plane of Air]] belonging to [[Akadi]], the [[power]] of [[elemental air]].
document_data.Cosmography: This realm existed within the [[Great Wheel cosmology|Great Wheel]] cosmological model.
document_data.Geography: This realm was a gigantic whirlwind, said to be so large that it could swallow whole [[planet]]s in its wake. It was a mobile realm, drifting across the Elemental Plane of Air as Akadi willed, and the winds it generated spiraled outward all across the plane.
